keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: All is quiet here. The Marrimac is being repaired at Norfolk. FORTRESS MONROE, Friday, March 14 P.M.

headline.main: NEWS FROM FORTRESS MONROE.; The Merrimac Still Undergoing Repairs Everything Quiet. OUR FORTRESS MONROE CORRESPONDENCE.

docs.lead_paragraph: All is quiet here. The Marrimac is being repaired at Norfolk. FORTRESS MONROE, Friday, March 14 P.M.

docs.snippet: The special order, the bill for the reorganization of the militia, was postponed.
